title: Welcome Home: A Short Story
description:
This is my first torrent so go easy on me.

Title: Welcome Home: A Short Story 
Author: William Hage
Amazon Link:

Description: John Lester is returning to a place he never really considered home to begin with, a place that he has not seen in years. But what he does not realize is that what went on in this house was much less homely than he thought as he unearths something dark about his family.


"Welcome Home" is a short story approximately 6600 words.

It is a Horror/Thriller short story. 

Provided .mobi, .epub, .pdf (Note epub and pdf are just converted using Calibre from the original.mobi format)



Username is reference to a William S. Burroughs book.
